column2: MUD]]. It opened in [[1997]] and is set in [[Middle-earth]] at the [[Third Age]].<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/burning.html The Burning Eye] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 11 April 2011)</ref><ref name="official">[http://www.burning-eye.net/main The Burning Eye], Main (retrieved 11 April 2011)</ref> The mud has more than 300 skills, 12 races and 10 classes.<ref name="official"/>

column1: The Burning Eye has twelve races, of which there are eight good and four evil.<ref>[http://www.burning-eye.net/world/races/ The Burning Eye], World, Races (retrieved 11 April 2011)</ref>
This mud has ten classes.<ref>[http://www.burning-eye.net/world/classes/ The Burning Eye], World, Classes (retrieved 11 April 2011)</ref>
